description.value:
This tattoo takes the shape of the face of a roaring polar bear with piercing, ice-blue eyes. You don't take damage from extreme cold or severe cold.

Activate 2 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You call forth a blast of polar wind in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within a range of 30 feet that deals @Damage[7d6[cold]|traits:area-damage] damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic:true|name:Tattoo Polar Blast|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
